@Dunderadde

Trial Reset works perfectly for all language version NIS 2013 and is in english.
 For Example:
 - Download and install english version
 - Turn off Norton Tamper Protection
 - Restart in save mode
 - Press "convert" button
 - Enjoy !

Since searches for this torrent will undoubtedly increase throughout 2013, here's a quick translation of the OP's Polish description.

*   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *

The latest version of one of the world's most popular security packages, created by Symantec.

Norton Internet Security 2013 offers:
ability to customize security settings
automatic analysis of malware
phishing protection
spyware protection
hacker protection
more

Security Option Inspector checks for security browser settings, passwords, network shares, running services, etc. The interface, though somewhat complex, is designed such that less experienced users can still interact with it.

Install info:

- Install
- Turn off Tamper Protection for 15 min
- Reboot in Safe Mode [F8]
- Launch Trial Reset and click [ Convert ]

*   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *
